events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking status hasn’t changed for several days and I’m concerned about the delay in delivery.
The case was reviewed and categorized under the delivery delay cluster due to customer's report of shipping delay and tracking issues.
Support agent Mark has been assigned to handle the issue regarding the delayed order shipment reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m Mark and I’ll be assisting you today with your delayed order.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details available so I can investigate the current status and estimated delivery time for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the last tracking update showed arrival at the local distribution center five days ago with no further updates.
I’ve contacted our shipping partner to get an update on your package and requested expedited handling to ensure it arrives as soon as possible.
Thank you for acting quickly. I appreciate the update and hope the package will arrive soon.
Your package has now been delivered successfully according to the latest records. Please let us know if you experience any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your order and everything is in good condition. Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
Since the issue has been resolved and confirmed by you, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and choosing our store.
